text: Singapore Vikings FC is an expatriate football club based in Singapore. The players are mainly made up of Danish players, mostly having played in professional, semi-professional or amateur division football in their native country. The Vikings are also well known for their aim to run 1000km in order to raise $20,000 for migrant workers in Singapore during the COVID-19 period. == References == *Football: Singapore Vikings aim to run 1,000km to raise $20,000 for migrant workers *Singapore Vikings FC Category:Football in Singapore Category:Asian football clubs Category:Organizations based in Singapore
title: Singapore Vikings FC
